name: Grotle

evolution.description: Grotle can evolve into Torterra at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Grove Pokémon. It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to extra damage dealt by a Critical Hit.
